audiobook.description:
Author(s): Matt Walsh Narrator(s): Phil Paonessa

The average Christian in America does not know what his own religion teaches, nor does he care. He may call himself “Christian,” but he lives his life exactly as he wishes, making no attempt to conform his conduct to the commands and tenets of his religion. Daily Wire writer Matt Walsh confronts his fellow Christians in this bold, clear-eyed audio book that serves as an urgent reminder of Matthew 7:13 — "For wide is the gate and broad is the road that leads to destruction, and many enter through it."

Author(s): Matt Walsh
Narrator(s): Phil Paonessa
<P>The average Christian in America does not know what his own religion teaches, nor does he care. He may call himself “Christian,” but he lives his life exactly as he wishes, making no attempt to conform his conduct to the commands and tenets of his religion. <I>Daily Wire</I> writer Matt Walsh confronts his fellow Christians in this bold, clear-eyed audio book that serves as an urgent reminder of Matthew 7:13 — "For wide is the gate and broad is the road that leads to destruction, and many enter through it."</P>
audiobook.name: Church of Cowards: A Wake-Up Call to Complacent Christians
